de.zorgk.drums
Interface RiffInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassicBlastBeat, EmuApplet.EmptyRiff, HumanizedClassicBlastBeat, HumanizedLeapBlastBeat, HumanizedStraightBlastBeat, PatternedHitsRiff, RestRiff, RiffAntiChain, RiffChain, SimpleHitsRiff
public interface RiffInterface

Interface for objects that will play a drum riff

Author:
immanuel

 RiffInterface getClone()

Field Detail

framesPerSecond

static final long framesPerSecond
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

timeElapse

boolean timeElapse(long framestart,
                   long framenextstart,
                   java.util.LinkedList<RiffInterface> stack,
                   SamplerSetup sampler)
do necessary stuff for the given time interval in frames.

Parameters:
framestart - start of interval
framenextstart - start of next interval (one frame after interval ends)
stack - for modification of the RiffInterface-stack by the object
sampler - sampler object (use for hitting drums etc.)
Returns:
true to be removed from stack (after reaching the end of the riff)

getClone

RiffInterface getClone()
                       throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
clone the interface object, such that it can be processed independently

Returns:
copy
Throws:
java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
